item.title: Black bitumenous substance, 28th January
item.description:

item.title: Deep pothole in road, 28th January
item.description:
Large deep pothole on the road under the danson underpass - have to swerve to avoid it as it will likely cause damage to car at 30mph - its very deep. Terrible for small cars. Has been there for some time, please fix urgently.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Danson Underpass, Blendon, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Light not working - second time of reporting, 28th January
item.description:
Dangerous road - Light not working - second time of reporting, first time you did absolutely nothing! One of the lights has been out for ages in the wooded area, this combined with multiple potholes that have been there for months makes this road a death trap for cyclists in the dark.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 127, Dunkery Road, Chinbrook, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
